name: Highly Mechanized Prosthetic Quadruped/Mechanical Beast (Girl) 四足机械兽/兽娘
description:
Full prompts to improve the effect: prosthetic quadruped,quadruped machinery,mechanical tail,mechanical parts, robot joints,hydraulic system,headgear

提升效果全套咒语：prosthetic quadruped,quadruped machinery,mechanical tail,mechanical parts, robot joints,hydraulic system,headgear

========================

Thanks to the help of 搞事德·乔斯达 and the inspiration from one mega's owner (sadly I do not know his/her name).

感谢搞事德·乔斯达的帮助以及mega盘的一位大佬带来的灵感（可惜我不知道TA叫啥）。

This lora will bring you super cool Prosthetic Quadrupeds/Mechanical Beasts. Also, it is another Mecha Musume lora.

该lora将会带给你极其酷炫的四足机械兽。此外这也是个机娘lora。

If you want to get a Mechanical Beast Girl, you should add strength to 1girl and describe the girl's head's features like the color of her hair and eyes.

如果你想要机械兽娘，你应该稍微给1girl加更多权重，并描述机娘的头部特征，比如她的瞳色和发色。

Sizes of imgs might have influences on the output, it is suggested to set width larger than height.

图片尺寸对结果可能有影响，建议将图片宽度设置超过高度。

"all fours" and "bent over" will help with the pose, just input one or both of them. Well, if you just want a standing normal girl, that's also ok, just input "standing" instead.

"all fours" 和 "bent over" 对姿势有帮助，输入一个或是全输入比较好。不过如果你想要个站着的机娘，也可以，输入standing就行。

"headgear" is not necessary.

"headgear" 并不是必要的。

You can also try animals like "dog", "tiger".

你还可以试试动物，比如狗和老虎。
